subject: Re: Quartz Crystals?
author: psi_research
full_text:
Hi Judy. sure have. It wasn't my idea, it was a somewhat spontaneous
act by someone who was present during a Box session. A native American
who was with us had several in his pocket and simply walked up to us
and placed one on the Box and said it will help. We were already
getting interesting results but have still tried using crystals since
then. -Bill

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood"
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All, Just got an email from Mark Macy (Happy New Year, + info.)
and read about quartz crystals being used for getting EVP's  . . . .
so was wondering IF anyone's used any with their boxes, yet?  Results?
 =Judy=
>
